snippet.title: Fobia - St. Dinfna Hotel - Gameplay Spotlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a more detailed look around the halls of the St. Dinfna Hotel in this new gameplay spotlight trailer  showcasing the title’s unique systems. By utilizing the game’s camera to see into the past, present and future, players can best decide their next move. Engaging with enemies isn’t always the best option, and today’s video also highlights the game’s varied and interesting puzzles that players will need to solve if they hope to uncover the dark mysteries of the hotel.

Fobia - St. Dinfna Hotel is coming to PC and the Playstation and Xbox family of consoles on June 28th 2022.

Try the demo and wishlist on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1298140/FOBIA__St_Dinfna_Hotel/ 

Pre-order now: http://www.maximumgames.com/fobia/  

Chasing a potential lead, amateur journalist Roberto Leite Lopes travels to the St. Dinfna Hotel hoping to find his big break. His investigative skills will be needed not only to uncover the truth but to survive when reality is turned upside down with his discovery of a camera that reveals different timelines, a fanatical cult, human experiments, and apparitions roaming the halls. Solve puzzles and scavenge for anything to stop their hunt as the past, present and future collide. 

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/maximumgames

Follow us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OfficialMaximumGames/
